mapper.insert: INSERT INTO danger_section (name, road_type, s_latitude, s_longitude, f_latitude, f_longitude, alternative_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{roadType}, #{startLatitude}, #{startLongitude}, #{finishLatitude}, #{finishLongitude}, #{alternativeId});
mapper.update: UPDATE danger_section SET name = #{name}, road_type = #{roadType}, s_latitude = #{startLatitude}, s_longitude = #{startLongitude}, f_latitude = #{finishLatitude}, f_longitude = #{finishLongitude}, alternative_id = #{alternativeId} WHERE danger_section_id = #{dangerSectionId};
